channel.title: Looking for partner/partners for an awesome project!
channel.description:
[size=20pt]Hey guys! [/size]
[size=12pt] :) I'm looking for a partner and or partners for a project I started a while agooooo. :)[/size]
[size=10pt]I had a great time coding some basics for this source such as new home, shops, training all that noob stuff![/size]
Once I had that It was time to get a functioning client, and web-client which was a little bit of a challenge.
I have a working client connected to server with name, etc. But it needs some work done on it since it seems people downloading it have had complications.
I have ran a server before a long long time ago in almost my first week of even getting into runescape private servers..Not to brag really but it had like 30+ players for a while, i'm not saying thats really that good and actually bragging but I guess it okay for starting out? :D
I have gotten in contact with someone who can host the server and know someone who can get it out there a bit more once its released with a runescape youtube channel with over 8k subs!
I made a server development thread on it a while back with lots of pictures so feel free to take a look: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,627496.msg4270825.html#msg4270825
I hope you are interested since I really wanna get the server going but just need some help! I hope the colors arent giving you a headache either! Thank you!

item.title: Looking for partner/partners for an awesome project!
item.dc:creator: @Hulsif Hulsif
item.source: Looking for partner/partners for an awesome project!
